body.p: In response to the Discussion Paper Reducing Complexity in Reporting Financial Instruments, many commented that restricting the ability to achieve hedge accounting for groups of items, including net positions, had resulted in a hedge accounting model that was inconsistent with the way in which an entity actually hedges (ie for risk management purposes). Similar concerns about the restrictions of IAS 39 for applying hedge accounting to groups of items were raised as part of the IASB’s outreach activities for its Hedge Accounting project.
